Room.Name: Glabor Gulley Northern Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the western end of the northern path, in Glabor Gulley.
Room.LongDescription: The path meanders randomly across the northen face of the gulley, passing near the entrances to many of the caves you see farther east. A large clump of bushes hides a portion of the path immediately east, but as you look down, you see many campfires and dark, troll-like figures gathered there.
